meanings.definition: The state or quality of being proud.
meanings.sent1: Her proudness was evident in the way she held her head high.
meanings.sent2: His proudness at winning the race was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The cat's proudness after catching the mouse was comical.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood with proudness, reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The child's proudness at tying his shoes for the first time was heartwarming.

meanings.definition: A feeling or deep pleasure or satisfaction derived from one's own achievements.
meanings.sent1: The artist's proudness in completing the masterpiece was evident.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of proudness after acing the exam.
meanings.sent3: The cake's proudness at being perfectly baked was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone with proudness as it set over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: His proudness in helping others made him a role model in the community.
